CustomField.formula:
IF( Unresolved_PEs__c >= 1 , "üü† Insufficient Stock" & BR(), "") & IF( ISPICKVAL( Type , "Delivery Charge") , "" , TEXT(QuantityFulfilled) & " / " & TEXT(QuantityOrdered) & " fulfilled" & IF( QuantityCanceled = 0 , "" , BR() & "(" & TEXT(QuantityCanceled) & " cancelled)" )
& IF( OR( QuantityReturnInitiated = 0 , QuantityReturned = QuantityReturnInitiated ), "" , BR() & "‚öôÔ∏è (" & TEXT(QuantityReturnInitiated-QuantityReturned) & " return initiated)" )
& IF( QuantityReturned = 0 , "" , BR() & "(" & TEXT(QuantityReturned) & " returned)" ) & IF( QuantityReshipped = 0 , "" , BR() & "(" & TEXT(QuantityReshipped) & " reshipped)" )
)
CustomField.label: Current
